mapper.insert: insert into tomato (tomato_name, member_id, tomato_full_regular, tomato_left_regular, tomato_full_break, tomato_left_break ) values (#{tomatoName}, #{memberId}, #{tomatoFullRegular}, #{tomatoFullRegular}, #{tomatoFullBreak}, #{tomatoFullBreak})
insert into tomato (tomato_name, member_id, template_idx ) values (#{tomatoName}, #{memberId}, #{templateIdx})
mapper.update: update tomato set tomato_name = #{tomatoName}, tomato_full_regular = #{tomatoFullRegular}, tomato_full_break = #{tomatoFullBreak}, tomato_left_regular = #{tomatoLeftRegular}, tomato_left_break = #{tomatoLeftBreak}, tomato_can_start = #{tomatoCanStart} where tomato_idx = #{tomatoIdx}
